page.title: 03The caretakers Interview.
page.content: 1. What is your full name? Harry Hugh Twigg. 2. How long have you been living here? 30 years. 3.Where did you go to school? Chappel Chorlton school. 4. Where do you live now? Baldwins Gate Farm. 5. How long have you been a cartaker at this school? 17 years. (6a) How many days do you work? 5 days. 6. How much has Baldwins Gate changed while you have been here? Oh, it's changed a lot because there used to be a railway station and the sand quarry where I live at Baldwins Gate farm so its changed quite a lot. Oh, they have put street lighting in.
